ComicInfo.Summary:
NECESSARY EVIL CONTINUES! Trini and Zack meet the one person who can make them OMEGA RANGERS, but are warned about the consequences of joining Jason. At the Tower of Light, Tommy faces off against Lord Zedd, but without his powers will he be strong enough to stop him?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Main Cover | Eleonora Carlini | 1 | B | Preorder Variant Cover | Miguel Mercado (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 2 | Var | 1:20 Album Variant Cover | Amelia Vidal | 3 | Var | Social Variant Cover | Johanna the Mad (a) & Dylan Todd (d) | 4 | *Notes:* The 1:20 Album Variant Cover is a homage of the album cover for Dr. Dre's The Chronic.
